name: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
desc: These constants are used with setObject(_:forProperty:) and object(forProperty:) to get or set the characteristics of a synthesizer.

items.name: static let status: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get speech-status information for the synthesizer.

items.name: static let errors: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get speech-error information for the synthesizer.

items.name: static let inputMode: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get or set the synthesizer’s current text-processing mode.

items.name: static let characterMode: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get or set the synthesizer’s current text-processing mode.

items.name: static let numberMode: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get or set the synthesizer’s current number-processing mode.

items.name: static let rate: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get or set a synthesizer’s speech rate.

items.name: static let pitchBase: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get or set a synthesizer’s baseline speech pitch.

items.name: static let pitchMod: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get or set a synthesizer’s pitch modulation.

items.name: static let volume: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get or set the speech volume for a synthesizer.

items.name: static let synthesizerInfo: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get information about the speech synthesizer being used on the specified synthesizer.

items.name: static let recentSync: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get the message code for the most recently encountered synchronization command.

items.name: static let phonemeSymbols: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Get a list of phoneme symbols and example words defined for the synthesizer.

items.name: static let currentVoice: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Set the current voice on the synthesizer to the specified voice.

items.name: static let commandDelimiter: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Set the embedded speech command delimiter characters to be used for the synthesizer.

items.name: static let reset: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Set a synthesizer back to its default state.

items.name: static let outputToFileURL: NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey
items.desc: Set the speech output destination to a file or to the computer’s speakers.

items.name: struct NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.CommandDelimiterKey
items.desc: Keys for the command delimiters.

items.name: struct NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.ErrorKey
items.desc: Keys that identify errors that may occur during speech synthesis.

items.name: struct NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.Mode
items.desc: Keys for the speaking mode.

items.name: struct NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.PhonemeInfoKey
items.desc: Keys for the speech phoneme information.

items.name: struct NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.StatusKey
items.desc: Keys for the speech synthesizier status.

items.name: struct NSSpeechSynthesizer.SpeechPropertyKey.SynthesizerInfoKey
items.desc: Keys for the speech synthesizier information.
